2: Community 2 is located on the east side of the Great Hall of the People, Dongcheng District, Beijing, near parks and green spaces. There are still several houses available for rent, ranging from 2400 to 2800. The community is equipped with parking lot and sports facilities, and is surrounded by metro, supermarkets, shopping malls, schools, restaurants and banks.
